item.title: Runescape autologin-- by richie
item.dc:creator: @Sebo Sebo
item.description:
@Sebo wrote:

yeah, This is what I did, (my first script lol), anyways, nice, I used coords for my first script, and yes try using bitmaps, helps a bunch =) I get this error, but this is my first really edited script, learn off of it if you want

[scar]{++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++]
[++++++++++++++ ++++++++++++++]
[ Sebo’s RuneScape Window Opener/Loginer ]
[ Made by: Sebo! ]
[ Credits- Weibs, And all the people who help me on Mopar. ]
[ Setup Lines/Username/Password Setup on - 41-42 ]
[ Enjoi, my script ]
[ Other: I spent over 6 weeks perfecting this script. ]
[ And I acctually might start using SRL, Once i Furgure out how to. ]
[ 240+ Lines of Script!!! ]
[++++++++++++++ ++++++++++++++]
[++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++}

Program RuneScape_Opener;

{-----------------------------------]
| Comment me On Mopar, Username = |
| Sebo (Well Duhhh.) |
[-----------------------------------}

{ |—|
|—|
|—|
-----------
---------/
-------/
-----/
—/
-/
-
Go Down For Setup! }

Var
User,Tool,Play,x,y:Integer;

//////////////////////////////////////////////
Const/////////////////////////Setup///////////
UserName = ‘UserName Here’; //Username HERE //
PassWord = ‘PassWord Here’; //Password HERE //
//////////////////////////////////////////////

//--------------------------------------------------------------|
{ Dont Touch Anymore if Your A LEECHER. *
| |
|---------------------------------------------------------------}

Procedure IE_Finder;
Begin
Tool := BitmapFromString(13, 8, ‘2139713A5F8E70A8C893DBEF9C’ +
‘EDFE98F0FE8AF1FE78EDFE69EBFD5CDEFB4DD2FA4CD2FB4CC4F06’ +
‘AA1C2A3EBFAB0FEFFA6FDFF92F0FE83EFFD75F6FD6BF3FC60E8FB’ +
‘4ED7F940C8F73BC2F63BC1F5B3FEFFB5FFFF98F3FE83DDFA5FB0D’ +
‘168B4D168F0FB59E3F94AD3F73BC4F632B8F22EB3EF30B0EFAEFE’ +
‘FF89E4FD69BCDF4370A15E90B568DBF358DDF748D1F73BC2F432B’ +
‘7F02DB0ED2BABEC2BA9EB81DAF75BABCF26417A4C7EA964D6F151’ +
‘D6F53DBBEC30A7E12A9DDC279FDF2BA6E82BA8EA2BA4E94B8DB72’ +
‘23B734182AB5AD5F14CD1F435A8DF237FB51E689B1C63931F76B0’ +
‘2494D72A9FE4299EE62138703F8BB35CD4F24ED6F736ABE11F639’ +
‘51936621A305F1934631838661A487B2388CC299BE53985AE55D2’ +
‘F151D6F73EBFF02374A8162A531D356B1E346E1C356E1C356E1C3’ +
‘66D1C528B2995DE’);
If(Findbitmap(Tool,x,y))Then
MoveMouseSmoothEx(x,y,15,15,14,58,12);
Wait(150+Random(150));
ClickMouse(x,y, True);
Wait(43);
ClickMouse(x,y, True);
Wait(4000);
End;

Procedure BoredMouse;
Begin
Repeat
MoveMouseSmoothEx(500+Random(500),250+Random(500),15,15,35,50,15);
Wait(500+Random(500));
Until(Findcolor(x,y,14258485,5,22,971,253));
End;

Procedure IE_Tool;
Begin
If(FindColor(x,y,14258485,5,22,971,253))Then
MoveMouseSmoothEX(x,y,15,14,16,58,10);
ClickMouse(x,y, True);
Wait(6000)
End;

Procedure RuneScape;
Begin
SendKeys(‘w’);
Wait(175)
SendKeys(‘w’);
Wait(141)
SendKeys(‘w’);
Wait(165)
SendKeys(’.’);
Wait(61)
SendKeys(‘R’);
Wait(74)
SendKeys(‘u’);
Wait(127)
SendKeys(‘ne’);
Wait(61)
SendKeys(‘Sc’);
Wait(45)
SendKeys(‘a’);
Wait(116)
SendKeys(‘p’);
Wait(215)
SendKeys(‘e’);
Wait(143)
SendKeys(’.’);
Wait(111)
SendKeys(‘co’);
Wait(122)
SendKeys(‘m’+chr(13));
Wait(111)
Wait(3421)
End;

Procedure FindThatGame;
Begin
Play := BitmapFromString(13, 17, ‘z78DAA5935B8E85400844B724’ +
‘D0CFCF7E78F7BFA461284CDA8C1A73E7A74C040F50204F2EBC4DE’ +
‘A398F37DAF75672A8B5C4D84390C64D84076FABBEA7AD3AA4F51C’ +
‘9439859CB671FA9606459FCF349FA20B7390C2BB3EAC8752728A7’ +
‘4EAB0B44F4ECF930692C475A53DE7AF3917D19573F4A6DD56CA33’ +
‘A6DBDE2CF35FBE6DCA9F5ABB91EB779C5E1BA71D53B05D9AF6366’ +
‘97F750FA34BAE20949E9BEE119CC1913A549210D73B57E1D549D7’ +
‘EDD83D382D3151955D2AA70B9AB9FA86F6AB34BC377B7FD99B3AA’ +
‘0B50A8F5B1A360EA6F98FE8052D691623EABA49E4E41CA8B9E475’ +
‘E14C95C9179E6BACEAC6EDAB1373259B1BFCE17C68E06BDFDC07D’ +
‘C249856D7FFB8A1B486E94E3BC57BE4A3A2CDE83956D1A7F83B2F’ +
‘7AB329FCDE6CA7C8591D46D433C13C578463BE8563A73F315724A’ +
‘D’);
//Bitmap Test!//
If(FindBitmap(Play, x,y))Then
MoveMouseSmoothEx(x+3,y+4,14,21,15,15,2);
ClickMouse(x,y, True);
Wait(150);
ClickMouse(x,y, True);
Wait(2500);
If(FindColorTolerance(x,y,66104,556,331,783,449,10))Then
MoveMouseSmoothEX(x,y,15,15,15,10,10);
ClickMouse(x,y, True);
Wait(1500);
FindColor(x,y,2109487,340,246,578,384);
Wait(500);
MoveMouseSmoothEX(x,y,15,15,15,10,10);
ClickMouse(x,y, True);
Wait(4000);
Repeat //
MoveMouseSmoothEx(500+Random(500),250+Random(500),15,15,35,50,15);
Wait(500+Random(500));
Until(FindBitmap(User,x,y));
Sleep(35000);
User := BitmapFromString(53, 15, ‘z78DAA558498EC3300CFB5250’ +
‘2B69E798629AFF3FA940ED03039A329DE4201482AC855A6C351E1’ +
‘1F18957EC6BC47F1CEBBE6EEB732B482B5FD27A1669D5F9A3E553’ +
‘8EF8ABB4237987B27E8CE592B6A6732FEF88B295572C8D560E586’ +
‘9BF734C40E7846F28C91A887610608BB99EDC1F9565958B8A1552’ +
‘F0F0E42D2076189F15BBC8A985863A7BA98A3A7E12268E8C9254E’ +
‘82DE9977B38516F22B3AA664E79747A50A1811CD1A11DAF389614’ +
‘BD7CCE7432C8511BDDEA63DEF150546CAEB3D945DC6C1F2EA267C’ +
‘F319657BDEFC4883A07E891ADCE04CB699A4DD5EF6CB713EFCFC3’ +
‘7A5675D0894F77D0A9F7813F98B402997C1AA3AD1A756EA521F32’ +
‘8A5BCEBEFDC629311B1F3ACE3378CD2CC1352E56276D2E6F29DDA’ +
‘8369A6FC74E4D10AF2151ADCB9EA05A8AC6085E79AFD8A623D3C3’ +
‘F55773B68E4F2155BD55F72AA40B538B5C7F782440FACAB88F2EE’ +
‘F06F96FB7CAE49DC2F648CE09BDFB988E1003DBA9B94BC73AF4D9’ +
‘CBD8DAA422FAF2BA70BD4B4579E0CE667DAE97790CFEB798006ED’ +
‘688BF1F1BD26EF3BE85F872F5FE6B4792949D689671D3EBF64648’ +
‘538BBBFF3CF8092375E77D6AE37BB9D5D7BA98A3D4855E3C0A2C2’ +
‘2DC77C722BE777FB20838A73630BCE6F1F35C3BF9F2B3A22’
If(FindBitmap(User,x,y))Then
MoveMouseSmoothEX(x,y,15,15,15,10,10);
ClickMouse(x,y, True);
Wait(1500);
SendKeys(UserName+chr(13));
Wait(257);
SendKeys(PassWord);
Wait(650);
MoveMouseSmoothEX(x,y,15,15,15,10,10);
ClickMouse(x,y, True);
HoldMouse(x,y, True);
Wait(8); //Realistic Human Mouse Click
ReleaseMouse(x,y, True); //Kinda like antiBan =)
Wait(3458);
End;

{--------------------------------------------------------]
[The Script Will Hide itself to make it look like it’s a ]
[Human or a GHOST! Oooohhh, Spooky! ]
[--------------------------------------------------------}
Procedure credits;
begin
Writeln(’##########################################################’)
WriteLn(’# Thanks for using Sebos… #’)
WriteLn(’# RuneScape Window Opener! #’)
WriteLn(’#Another thanks to MJordan for the credits =) #’)
WriteLn(’#For the person / People, who made the F1 Thing #’)
WriteLn(’#And Most Of All Thanks To Kaitnieks For Creating SCAR! #’)
WriteLn(’##########################################################’)
end;

{-----------------}
{| Main Script |}
{-----------------}
///////////////////
//-DONT TOUCH----//
///////////////////

Begin
GetSelf.Hide;
ActivateClient;
WriteLn(‘Enjoi My script, Thanks.’);
IE_Finder;
BoredMouse;
IE_Tool;
RuneScape;
FindThatGame;
WriteLn(’////////////////’);
WriteLn(’//-GO SEBO!—//’);
WriteLn(’////////////////’);
Credits;
GetSelf.Show;
{—Oh Yeah!—}
End.[/scar]

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape autologin-- by richie
item.dc:creator: @r_ch_e r!ch!e
item.description:
@r_ch_e wrote:

[size=16pt]I’ve figured out the problem thnx to scarscape. For it to work you must have the screen resolution at 1152 by 864[/size]

I plan to use bitmaps now instead of co-ordinates

[size=14pt]To setup just enter your usename and password, then maximise scar. NOTE: Must have internet explorer in top left corner of your desktop.Please leave feedback on how to improve. I’d appreciate it. :D[/size]

[code]{=========================================================================]
[ Rich Log ]
[ Version: 1.1 ]
[=========================================================================]
| Description: |
| A Macro that logs you onto runescape |
[=========================================================================]
[!!!PLEASE READ!!!]
[ Internet explorer MUST be in the top left corner of your desktop ]
[ If this is inconvenient plz tell me. ]
[ SET YOUR SCREEN RESOLOUTION to 1152 by 864 ]
[ Plz give me feedback to improve the script ]
[=========================================================================]
[Version: ]
[1.0- Script released— edit— it did not work for everyone ]
[1.1- Added forms-- that work Thanks to Mad cow’s form tutorial! ]
[1.2- Save setting added!!! ]
[=========================================================================]
[Future Updates: ]
[----------------I plan to make it work for firefox ]
[----------------I plan to make it work with the runescape client ]
[----------------I plan to use bitmaps so you dont have to ]
[ change the resolution ]
[=========================================================================]
[Notes: This logs onto a f2p world not p2p. Sorry members ;-( ]
[ It should work on slower computers aswell, but if not just tell me ]
[ This script will also work if you have scar maximised ]
[=========================================================================}

program Richlog;

var
frmDesign : TForm;
Label1 : TLabel;
Label2 : TLabel;
Edit2 : TEdit;
Edit1 : TEdit;
Button1 : TButton;
Username, Password : String;

Procedure Log;
Begin
MoveMouseSmooth(1093,15);
ClickMouse(1093,15, True);
MoveMouseSmooth(38,19);
ClickMouse(38,19, True);
Wait(250);
ClickMouse(38,19, True);
Wait(2500);
MoveMouseSmooth(232,105);
ClickMouse(232,105, True);
SendKeys(‘www.runescape.com’);
SendKeys(+chr(13));
Wait(3500);
MoveMouseSmooth(820,410);
ClickMouse(820,410, True);
Wait(2500);
MoveMouseSmooth(406,399);
ClickMouse(406,399, True);
Wait(2500);
MoveMouseSmooth(517,324);
ClickMouse(517,324, True);
Wait(17000);
MoveMouseSmooth(652,529);
ClickMouse(652,529, True);
Wait(2500);
End;

Procedure Setup;
Begin
SendKeys(+ Username);
Wait(1000);
MoveMouseSmooth(448,482);
SendKeys(+chr(13));
Wait(150);
SendKeys(+ Password);
Wait(150);
MoveMouseSmooth(497, 556);
ClickMouse(497,556, True);
Wait(3500);
MoveMouseSmooth(581, 571);
ClickMouse(581,571, True);
Writeln(‘You are now logged in. Thank you for using my script.’);
Wait(50);
Writeln(‘Please send me your feedback so i can improve the script.’);
Wait(500);
End;

procedure ButtonClick(sender: TObject);
begin
WriteLn(‘You have started the script----Please leave feedback’);
frmDesign.Caption:= frmDesign.Caption + ‘.’;
frmDesign.ModalResult:= mrOk;
end;

procedure InitForm;
begin
frmDesign := CreateForm;
frmDesign.Left := 250;
frmDesign.Top := 114;
frmDesign.Width := 263;
frmDesign.Height := 180;
frmDesign.Caption := ‘User and Pass Saver’;
frmDesign.Color := clBtnFace;
frmDesign.Font.Color := clWindowText;
frmDesign.Font.Height := -11;
frmDesign.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
frmDesign.Font.Style := [];
frmDesign.Visible := False;
frmDesign.PixelsPerInch := 96;
Label1 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label1.Parent := frmDesign;
Label1.Left := 32;
Label1.Top := 40;
Label1.Width := 51;
Label1.Height := 13;
Label1.Caption := ‘Username:’;
Label2 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label2.Parent := frmDesign;
Label2.Left := 33;
Label2.Top := 65;
Label2.Width := 49;
Label2.Height := 13;
Label2.Caption := ‘Password:’;
Edit1 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit1.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit1.Left := 93;
Edit1.Top := 37;
Edit1.Width := 121;
Edit1.Height := 21;
Edit1.TabOrder := 8;
Edit1.Text := LoadSetting(‘UserPassSaver’, ‘Username’);
Edit2 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit2.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit2.Left := 93;
Edit2.Top := 62;
Edit2.Width := 121;
Edit2.Height := 21;
Edit2.TabOrder := 9;
Edit2.Text := LoadSetting(‘UserPassSaver’, ‘Password’);
Edit2.PasswordChar:= ‘*’;
Button1 := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
Button1.OnClick := @ButtonClick;
Button1.Parent := frmDesign;
Button1.Left := 79;
Button1.Top := 99;
Button1.Width := 75;
Button1.Height := 25;
Button1.Caption := ‘Start!’;
Button1.TabOrder := 10;
end;

procedure SafeInitForm;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘InitForm’, v);
end;

procedure ShowFormModal;
begin
frmDesign.ShowModal;
end;

procedure SafeShowFormModal;
var v: TVariantArray;
begin setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘ShowFormModal’, v);
end;

procedure SetupAll;
begin
Username := Edit1.Text;
Password := Edit2.Text;
SaveSetting(‘UserPassSaver’, ‘Username’, Edit1.Text);
SaveSetting(‘UserPassSaver’, ‘Password’, Edit2.Text);
end;

begin
SafeInitForm;
SafeShowFormModal;
SetupAll;
////////////////////////////////////
WriteLn('Username = ’ + Username);// DELETE THIS IF YOU DO NOT WISH YOUR USER AND PASS TO BE WRIITTEN IN THE DEBUG BOX
Writeln('Password = ’ + Password);// BY KEEPING THIS IT WILL HELP SEE IF YOU ENTERED CORRECT INFORMATION
////////////////////////////////////
Log;
Setup;
end.[/code]

Read full topic
